comment._content: I guess that it wasn't taken past the summer of 1914.

comment.author: 37408767@N03
comment._content:
Indeed, because he was dead at the time and his wife too. Sadly begining the First World War.
His morganatic wife was the Princess then after 1909 Duchess  (and not Countess) Hohenberg, former Countess Sophie Chotek. In the right on the picture
